title: Samples, ca. 1910
dimensions:
a. Warp: 21.5 cm [8.5"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 31.5 cm [12.5"] Selvedge left side, cut right side.
b. Warp: 22 cm [8.5"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 26 cm [10 1/4 "]  Cut both sides.
c. Warp: 21 cm [8.25"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 25.5 cm [10"]  Cut both sides.
d. Warp: 24 cm [9.5"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 16 cm [6 1/4"]  Cut both sides.
e. Warp: 18.5 cm [7 1/4"]  Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 16 cm [6 1/4"]  Cut both sides.
creditline: Gift of Margaret and Teresa Gloster in memory of Mary and Margaret McElligott
description:
a. orange/red ground (warp) with motifs in green and yellow (weft)
b. gold color ground with motifs in green and white
c. gold color ground with motifs in green and pink
d. red ground with pink and darker red motifs
e. gold color ground with gold color motifs
